query: SELECT id, gestor_id, periodo, ambito, JSON_LENGTH(relatorio_json, '$.relatoriosSubmetidos') as num_relatorios, JSON_LENGTH(relatorio_json, '$.pontosDestacados.positivos') as num_positivos, JSON_LENGTH(relatorio_json, '$.gestaoPendentes.criadosNoPeriodo') as num_pendentes, created_at FROM relatorios_ia ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1;
